sentences.english: Siphonic outlet is one of the outlet forms in pump stations.

sentences.english: Malodorous gases require gas phase filtration prior to exhausting from irrigation tanks and pumping stations.

sentences.english: First, the district Guoku Chu construction of a booster pump station, on the water pressure.

sentences.english: We're storm-proofing the pumping stations and the pumping stations capacities are being increased.

sentences.english: The author points out that the water-saving and energy-saving work of pumping station is of great potentiality.

sentences.english: The foundation slab of Taipuhe pumping station is a typical huge foundation slab on soft foundation.

sentences.english: The booster pump station and regulating reservoir need to be set in urban water network in mountainous areas.

sentences.english: Many of the large pumping stations built and to-be-built in China are low-lift pumping stations.
